item.description:
Some great brewers that are already confirmed: Mayflower Brewing , Long Trail, Spaten, Mercury, Sebago Brewing, Green Mountain, Pennichuck, New Century, Merchant du Vin, Flying Dog, Sierra Nevada, Orlio, Magic Hat, Narrangansett, Saranac, Shipyard, Oskar Blues, Owen O'Leary's, Harpoon, Grittys, Gearys, Cody Brewing, Smuttynose, Buzzards Bay, Gardner Ale & Sherwood Forest! 66 brewers, 200+ beers!

Tickets on sale March 1, 2008 - $35 in advance, $40 at the door.

Website
item.how_to_find_us: We're meeting at the Sam Adams table at 6:30pm. We'll stay there for a little while to make sure everyone gets together, so please buy your ticket by 3pm tomorrow so we know exactly who's with our group.
item.why: Great event to check out new breweries around the world and try some new beer that you've never heard of before.
item.name: Beer Summit 2008
